title: Textile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain compound satin
description: Light terra-cotta satin ground with incomplete small scale, closely-spaced design based on lotus forms, highly conventionalized in ploychrome silk wefts. At one end portion of warp end of fabric.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Medium: silk
Technique: plain compound satin. Gift of Miss Beatrice Kates. 1940-4-10.
